articles.content:
Cyclors are back in the Americas Cup game.

articles.title: U.S. retail sales surge as holiday shopping starts, brightening economic outlook - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. retail sales surged in October as Americans eagerly started their holiday shopping early to avoid empty shelves amid shortages of some goods because of the ongoing pandemic, giving the economy a lift at the start of the fourth quarter.
articles.content: WASHINGTON, Nov 16 (Reuters) - U.S. retail sales surged in October as Americans eagerly started their holiday shopping early to avoid empty shelves amid shortages of some goods because of the ongoing… [+5369 chars]

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: Fifa to probe Ghana vs Bafana Bafana penalty saga - Goal.com
articles.description: Argentina could join Brazil and book its ticket for next year's 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar with four matches left to play in South America. But it will need to start by handing Brazil its first loss.
